pageTitle: Incentives and Rebates for your HVAC System: Suburban
textBeforeTable: Carrier New England AC Upgrade Program Let Suburban install a qualifying Carrier furnace AND install a new or replacement Carrier A/C condensing unit, then receive one of these rebates! ************************************************************FED CRED END**************************************************************************************--> Systems installed in 2012 are also eligible for tax credit. Now through December 2013. for prior claims submitted since Jan. 1, 2005. A $500 cap applies per homeowner or home. In addition, a lifetime tax credit cap of $500 applies Tax credit up to $300 Qualified Hot Water Heater Tax credit up to $150 AFUE ≥95% Boiler: Natural Gas / Propane Tax credit up to $150 AFUE ≥95% (with ECM motor) Furnace: Natural Gas / Propane Tax credit up to $300 ≥ 5 SEER / 12.5 EER / 8.5 HSPF Heat Pumps Tax credit up to $300 ≥16 SEER / 13 EER Air Conditioning Federal Tax Credits --> Limited time: now thru October 31, 2014 Mass Save Energy audit required. Not eligible for any other Mass Save or GasNetwork rebate. See us for certain for Energy Efficiency:
textAfterTable: ≥13 NA $150 Central AC ≥18 ≥13 NA $500 Ducted Air Source HP ≥16 NA ≥8.5 $250 Ducted Air Source HP ≥18 NA ≥9.6 $500 Ductless Mini-split HP ≥18 NA ≥9 $250 Ductless Mini-split HP ≥20 NA ≥11 $500 Mass Save Energy Rebate Program Installation Type Oil or Propane Heat Manufacturer’s AFUE is at least: High efficiency Warm Air Furnace $100 83% Oil, 90% Propane High efficiency Warm Air Furnace with an Electronically Communicated Blower Motor (ECM) $400 83% Oil, 92% Propane High Efficiency Hot Water Boiler $500 85% Oil, 85% Propane On-Demand or Indirect Water Heater $300 .82 EF for On-Demand (N/A for Indirect) Energy Star® programmable set-back thermostat $25 Must be Energy Star labeled (2 per customer)
